text: The National People's Congress Overseas Chinese Affairs Committee () is one of nine special committees of the National People's Congress, the national legislature of the People's Republic of China. The special committee was created during the first session of the 6th National People's Congress in June 1983, and has existed for every National People's Congress since. ==Chairpersons== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Congress !! Chairperson |- | 6th National People's Congress || Ye Fei (叶飞) |- | 7th National People's Congress || Ye Fei (叶飞) |- | 8th National People's Congress || Yang Taifang (杨泰芳) |- | 9th National People's Congress || Gan Ziyu (甘子玉) |- | 10th National People's Congress || Chen Guangyi (陈光毅) |- | 11th National People's Congress || Gao Siren (高祀仁) |- | 12th National People's Congress || Bai Zhijian (白志健) |- | 13th National People's Congress || Wang Guangya (王光亚) |} ==References== Category:Special committees of the National People's Congress
title: National People's Congress Overseas Chinese Affairs Committee
